content:
The border guards of the Guard Brigade of the offensive of the “steel border” raised over the settlements of Shabelne, Sand and Degtyarne, which are located near the state border from the Russian Federation in the so -called “gray zone” in Kharkiv region, flags of Ukraine.

This is stated inmessageState Border Service of Ukraine.

It is noted that the territory of these destroyed villages is tightly replaced, and due to constant enemy shelling is not suitable for living.

"However, the border guards of the Guard Brigade" Steel Border "control the terrain and remind the enemy that it is our land and it is not a place here!" - The message says.

As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the "Steel Border"Brightly destroyedThe "wheels" of the invaders.
title: Flags of Ukraine were raised over the settlements of Shabelne, Pishchane and Degtyarne
description: This is stated in the statement of the State Border Service of Ukraine. It is noted that ...
author: Army Inform
